meanings.sent1: The misusage of the tool led to a broken part.
meanings.sent2: The teacher corrected the misusage of punctuation in the essay.
meanings.sent3: The misusage of the word made everyone laugh during the presentation.
meanings.sent4: His misusage of time turned his day into chaos.
meanings.sent5: The misusage of the key left the door locked.

meanings.sent1: The misusage of power by the leader caused unrest among the people.
meanings.sent2: The company had strict policies against the misusage of company resources.
meanings.sent3: The misusage of the privilege resulted in its revocation.
meanings.sent4: Her misusage of trust shattered their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The misusage of the medication had severe consequences.
